titles: The history of the administration of Cardinal Ximenes, great minister of state in Spain written originally in French, by the sieur Michael Baudier of Languedoc ... and translated into English By W. Vaughan.

author: Baudier, Michel, 1589?-1645.

notes: Translation of: Histoire de l'administration du Cardinal Ximenes, grand ministre d'estat en Espagne.
